means: 被解掉枷锁的，不受束缚的
释放( unshackle的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: South America has unshackled its trade, restructured its rickety banks and tightened its fiscal belt.
sentence.Network_cn: 南美洲开放了贸易, 整顿了自己摇摇欲坠的银行,紧缩了财政开支.

sentence.Network_en: As markets are unshackled from the borders of geography, cross - border apples - to - apples comparisons become more significant.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于市场摆脱了地理疆界的限制, 跨境 的横向比较变得更加意义深远.

auth_sentence.content: Commoners were unshackled from feudal paralysis and freed to find God individually.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Commoners were unshackled from feudal paralysis and freed to find God individually.

auth_sentence.content: "Violence isn't a solution," said Mr. Yadav, who sat unshackled in the jail warden's office for a recent interview.
